alert.note: Alert for Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 6:13PM MDT until August 18 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Yellowstone County in south central Montana... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 611 PM MDT, a decaying thunderstorm producing strong west winds was located 7 miles north of Laurel, or 12 miles west of Billings, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Travel on Interstate 90 will be impacted by strong and sudden wind gusts. * Locations impacted include... Billings, Laurel, Lockwood, Shepherd, Huntley, Billings Heights, Billings West End, and Acton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
